text: I’ve started adding “Julia language” to all of my searches on Julia to see if it increases that search index popularity contest.  I used to just use “Julia”.   Does it make a difference?

elements.text: I’ve started adding “Julia language” to all of my searches on Julia to see if it increases that search index popularity contest.  I used to just use “Julia”.   Does it make a difference?

text: That's almost a philosophical question. Does the raindrop make a difference for the flood?

text: to make that statistic fair we should ask the popularity tabulators to give us 90% of the proportion of people who searched "Julia". For reference, they probably count all the people looking up pictures of snakes, or cups of coffee(java)
